Title: Defines the crime of sex trafficking of a child, person who is mentally disabled, or person who is mentally incapacitated
Summary: Defines the crime of sex trafficking of a child, person who is mentally disabled, or person who is mentally incapacitated as a class B felony.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to defining the crime of sex trafficking of a child, person who is mentally disabled, or person who is mentally incapacitated
